## Sprints (Linked)

Sprints are execution units of this plan. Each sprint groups related tasks.

### [PLAN-<Slug> | SPRINT-001] <Sprint Title>

- [ ] #<!-- issue --> [PLAN-<Slug> | SPRINT-001 | TASK-001] <Task title> [key:<ULID>] [labels:type:task, area:<area>] [status:TODO] [priority:MEDIUM] [estimate:4h]
- [ ] #<!-- issue --> [PLAN-<Slug> | SPRINT-001 | FEATURE-001] <Feature title> [key:<ULID>] [labels:type:feature, area:<area>] [status:TODO] [priority:HIGH] [estimate:8h]

## Template Instructions

### This is a Parent Issue (PAI)

- **PLAN** and **EPIC** are root-level documents (Level 1)
- They contain the full detailed scope and all derived work
- All child issues (SPRINTs, TASKs, etc.) MUST reference this parent

### Slug Generation

The `<Slug>` is auto-generated from the plan title:
1. Remove special characters and stop words
2. Convert to PascalCase (max 20 chars)
3. Prefix with document type

**Examples:**
- `HarmonyVoting Production Rollout` ‚Üí `PLAN-HarmonyVoting`
- `Q1 2026 Infrastructure Upgrade` ‚Üí `PLAN-Q1InfraUpgrade`

### Naming Convention

| Level | Type | Title Format | Content |
|-------|------|--------------|---------|
| **1 (PAI)** | PLAN | `[PLAN] Title` | Full detailed scope, all milestones |
| **2** | SPRINT | `[PLAN-<Slug> \| SPRINT-XXX] Title` | Execution instructions, grouped tasks |
| **3** | TASK/BUG/FEATURE/HOTFIX | `[PLAN-<Slug> \| SPRINT-XXX \| TYPE-NNN] Title` | Brief technical summary |

### Linking Children

Use both methods:
1. **GitHub task list:** `- [ ] #123` (tracks completion)
2. **Metadata tag:** `[parent:PLAN-<Slug>]` in child issue body

### Key Tags (Dedupe)

Every checklist item MUST include `[key:<ULID>]` for canonical identity:
```markdown
- [ ] Task title [key:01KFRBTZSPJTN6GNH4YKG3DMJP] [labels:...] [status:...] [priority:...] [estimate:...]
```
